In this week's edition of the Roundup, we'd be exploring the AI possiblities for a Regenerative Economy.                                                    

Emerging Technologies For Regenerative Economy

As the global technological scene approaches the era of AI led innovations, it has become increasingly important to explore the potential of Regenerative AI.

Regenerative AI is an emerging field that focuses on developing artificial intelligence (AI) systems that can learn and adapt to new situations, similar to how biological systems regenerate and adapt to changes in their environment.‌‌

Regenerative technologies presents the future of global technological advancements for a sustainable future. To fully achieve the key goals of the Regenerative Economy, it's important that we explore fully the potential of technology in the pursuit.

Technology for Regenerative Economy

Technology has played a critical role in the progress made so far for the Regenerative Economy.

Since the inception of Bitcoin, blockchain technology has evolved from a digital currency to a broader platform for decentralized applications. Today, blockchain technology has been immensely beneficial in the promotion of the Regenerative Economy by providing facilitating & scalable technologies for projects to build ReFi solutions.

The goals for a Regenerative Economy is necessary, achievable and potentially more possible by the invent of AI.

At its core, the key feature of the Regenerative AI are :

  • **Flexibility **:
  •   as opposed to the traditional AI systems designed to carry out specific tasks, Regenerative AI can adapt to new and changing system, as well as recover from failures and adapt to changing systems, making them suitable to carry out tasks like natural language processing, autonomous vehicle driving and so on.
  • **Sustainability **:
  •  Regenerative AI can be designed to maximize resources and reduce waste making them more sustainable than traditional AI system that gulps resources and produce alot of waste.
  • **Innovation **:
  •  Regenerative AI systems are capable of learning and adapting to new systems, allowing them develop new solutions to problems. This makes them ideal for research and development.

Regenerative AI. 🌿 ‌‌

At the core of AI developments is the potential for intelligence, learning and automation, — all of which are immensely beneficial for the Regenerative Economy, but Regenerative AI presents even more.

Rather than develop intrinsically flawed and biased forms of AI, ReFi projects can leverage the already existing Web3 solutions and the emerging AI technologies to develop a thinly intersected Web3-Regenrative AI that can map, model, adapt and monitor the regeneration of Earth.

For instance, imagine a global network of soil and water sensors augmenting broad spectrum satellite remote sensing or a transparent Blockchain secured data network of over a million smartphones and drones with eyes on earth — this is the real motherlode of Big data, — a whole-planet full-spectrum dashboard gathering intelligence on living systems in real time, constantly available to observe, track and.analyze by any ReFi conscious individual or institution.

Now imagine this motherlode of data being fed into a Regenerative algorithm that embodies natural intelligence, nature’s co-operating instructions and 40,000 years of indigenous wisdom gleaned from indigenous peoples (less than 5% of global population) now stewarding 80% of Earth’s remaining biodiversity.

This will be nothing short of revolutionary — a living learning machine and will pilot the global pursuit for Regenerative Revolution, across the whole diversity of living systems and species: from whole bioregions to the hidden life of the soil; and from blue whales to beneficial bacteria, will be profoundly illuminating and radically transformative in a myriad of ways almost impossible to predict.

To achieve the major goals for the Regenerative Economy, we must apply natural intelligence, nature’s guiding principles, and indigenous wisdom gleaned from 40,000 years of home planet observation and ecological niche experience.

Regenerative AI presents before us an opportunity to focus this natural, indigenous intelligence to protect, restore and regenerate damaged ecosystems and life-support systems across the globe.
